TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Defines the metadata attribute that task authors use to identify task properties that output data from the task.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine will only allow task properties marked with this attribute to output data from a task. Project authors can only use properties marked with this attribute in the `Output` element of a project file. All other task properties are treated as inputs to a task.
For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories.
[!code-cs[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/msbuild_MakeDirTask/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]
